titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2754) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2004, and for other purposes.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 128.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-377, by Mr. Reynolds.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2754 with 1 hour of general debate.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 444.

POSTPONED ROLL CALL VOTE - At the conclusion of debate, the Speaker put the question on adoption of the resolution and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Hastings (FL) demanded the yeas and nays and pursuant to clause 8 of rule XX, the Speaker postponed further proceedings on passage of the resolution until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 409 - 2 (Roll no. 625).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/18/2003--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2754 (Energy and Water Development Appropriations Act, 2004).
